- CRM automation architecture across FiveCRM, HubSpot, and Genie.AI.
- Email marketing engineering, including large-scale template frameworks and deliverability systems.
- High-throughput automation pipelines for YouTube publishing, LinkedIn-to-WordPress article creation, and metadata handling.
- Multicamera livestream direction and operation using vMix, ATEM, NDI/SDI, and SRT/RTMP technologies.
- Studio-based podcast and Tech Corner production workflows.
- Training staff across editing, camera operation, livestream technical handling, and CRM usage.

This role integrates operational, creative, engineering, and automation capabilities into a unified technical function.
